post_text: August 16, 2017 at 7:45 AM#1Good morning,Hope you are wellI am Harry and would like to know if you could help me perhaps...I need to know:What is the cmd to Fade out a "Dimmer" from 100% to 0% in a specific Cue in another Executor?What is the cmd to Fade out a specific Fixture Dimmer from 100% to 0% in a specific Cue?

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: August 23, 2017 at 11:21 PM#2HiSorry but your question doesn't make sense.A cue is a static state of your lights. If you want to fade in from 0 to 100, you need to record a 2nd cue, then fade from cue 1 (0%) to cue 2 (100%).

title: cmd
